page.title: 02Industry Mill Animal Feed
page.content: On the 25th of June 1985 a group of twelve children went to the mill.A man showed us around the mill and let us try some Locust Beans.The mill was built in 900 A.D. and was sited there at the six foot drop in the river.The first owner that the man knew about was Witgar who was a Saxon.The mill was first powered by water then steam, then gas,then diesel oil and then electricity.The Mill used to have its own power supply but does not any more. The mill grinds cereals and minerals but the cereals the Mill grinds the most are wheat,barley and oats.The ground products go into most countys in East Anglia and are used for feeding animals.The animals the meal is used for feeding are cows,pigs,sheep,poultry,game, horses and rabbits.
